title: Character Creation Continuation
goal: Continue a character creation pattern for storytelling.
prompt:
Continue the following character creation pattern:
Example 1:
Character Type: Hero
Description: Brave and curious
Example 2:
Character Type: Villain
Description: Intelligent but cold.
Now continue:
Character Type: Heroine
Description:

responses.gpt-5:
Character Type: Heroine
Description: Compassionate and determined.
responses.claude-3:
Character Type: Heroine
Description: Strong-willed and compassionate.
